transcript: We thought I was pregnant and we had a bottle of champagne, but no glasses. You asked me to dance. We kicked off our shoes and you popped the cork.

segments.text: We thought I was pregnant and we had a bottle of champagne, but no glasses.
You asked me to dance. We kicked off our shoes and you popped the cork.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: We thought I was pregnant and we opened a bottle of champagne but no glasses, you asked me to dance, we kicked off our shoes and you popped the cork.
